Text: E̩gba ejodudu ku Ze̩de̩kaya, o̩ma Josaya, onu Juda, chane̩ ejʼo̩fe̩, o̩la-i kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya.
Abu ki Jihofa aka ñwu mi de̩, kakini, Uwe̩ ki fʼe̩cha kpai oli uno̩lo̩ che kʼe̩ ko nʼo̩lo̩-we̩.
E̩ la kʼo̩ kpuche̩ rʼonu Ido̩m kpʼonu Moab kpʼonu amo̩ma Amo̩n kpʼonu Taya kpʼonu Saidon, lʼo̩wo̩ amonuche̩ ku ma wa Je̩rusale̩m ugbo Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda.
Dʼo̩la ide kide̩ ñwu ma tod amodu-ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, E̩wñ ku me̩ aka ñw amodu-me̩ le̩ de̩, kakini,
Omi nʼukpahiu-mi lile kpʼo̩wo̩-mi kʼu nadala te̩ chʼane̩-ile̩-i manyʼamone̩ kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ku ma jʼane̩ ile̩-i. Oñ nakʼo ñw e̩ne̩ du ki nyʼumieju.
Fai, umʼane̩ ane̩-i du ko nyu Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, adu-mi, o̩wo̩. U laño̩ mʼe̩wñ iñmi oko du ko ñw u ku ma rʼo̩.
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du arʼowñ kpʼo̩ma-wñ kpʼaaju-wñ gbogbo tak iko ane̩-wñ onugo ki jo̩. E̩gbale̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi wewe kpʼamonu lile adʼowñ chʼadu-ma.

I la awatu ka kʼabo uche̩ichi abe̩k ojane̩ ki ma je̩ re̩ Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n-i n, kʼi ma jʼakʼo̩lo̩-ma tʼofe oli uno̩lo̩ onu Babilo̩n-i n, u la anʼo̩kwochageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta, kpʼe̩wñ ibi bʼudu ñw abo uche̩ichi le̩, Jihofa aka-i, gbogbo tak u nʼo̩wo̩-wñ fʼuma lie̩ kpa.
I la chʼe-ame̩, me̩ ki we enetirʼamakache̩-me̩ kpʼamabifa-me̩ kpʼamano̩na-me̩ kpʼabo ku ma gʼakpa ojale kpʼamochu-me̩ ku ma jʼaka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ are̩ onu Babilo̩n in.
Todu ache̩ olemi ma ka ñwu me̩ le̩, kʼama ki mʼume̩ ño̩ bʼane̩-me̩ te̩ nyʼo̩najiji, kʼomi ki ne me̩ dufu, kʼame̩ ki lenyo̩.
Ama abo uche̩ichi kʼi jʼadʼo̩lo̩-wñ tʼofe oli uno̩lo̩ onu Babilo̩n, kʼi arʼo̩, natʼuma no̩ jʼojane̩ e-ma, ma la dodo o̩mo̩, ma anʼuche̩-ma alo, Jihofa aka-i.
U la ku teju o̩la-i du ñwu Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda, u kakini, Me̩ mʼo̩lo̩-me̩ ko jʼofe oli uno̩lo̩ onu Babilo̩n, ku me̩ rʼowñ kpʼabo-wñ, kʼame̩ ki deju.
E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ kpʼabo-we̩ aku ñw o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi le̩, alu ki Jihofa ka ugbo abo uche̩ichi du ki ma jʼarʼonu Babilo̩n in?
Me̩ ki la netirʼo̩la amakache̩ n ku ma ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ arʼonu Babilo̩n in. Todu ache̩ olemi ma ka ñwu me̩ le̩.
Omi kpʼuma uche̩ n, Jihofa aka-i; Ma muda akache̩ olemi ef odu-mi, kʼu ne me̩ dufu ku me̩ lenyo̩, owñ chʼame̩ kpʼamakache̩ ku ma jʼakache̩ ñwu me̩.

U ño̩ ko̩la ñw amatama kpʼamone̩-i du kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Ame̩ ki netirʼo̩la amakache̩-me̩ ku ma kache̩ ñwu me̩ n kakini, Go, ma akʼe̩wñ eku unyi Jihofa dabi kwo Babilo̩n wa faifai, todu ache̩ olemi ma jʼaka ñwu me̩ le̩.
Me̩ ki netirʼuma n; me̩ rʼonu Babilo̩n, ka me̩ ki deju. E̩wñ chi kʼewo-i amud alache̩?

Iche̩wñ kʼama chʼamakache̩ kʼo̩la Jihofa la dʼugbo-ma ochochi, mak ama ki chologu bo̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩wñ eku ki bo̩ jʼef unyi Jihofa, kpai ef unyi onu Juda, kpʼefu Je̩rusale̩m, ki we enyi Babilo̩n.
Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka ugbo ebijeikpa ki dago waala jo̩, kpai ohimini, kpʼakete, kpʼe̩wñ eku du ki bo̩ jʼef ewo-i,
owñ chʼe-ki Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, ma ko kwʼemi e̩gba kʼi mu Je̩konaya,
I-i, abu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka ugbo e̩wñ eku ki bo̩ ef unyi Jihofa kpʼef unyi onu Juda kpʼefu Je̩rusale̩m de̩, kakini,
Ma añʼo̩ nyi Babilo̩n, ane̩ le̩ la ajʼo̩mo̩ gbogbo wʼiko kʼu nyʼafejudʼo, Jihofa aka-i. E̩gbale̩ omi akʼo dabiwa, kʼu ko wa ajʼe̩gu-wñ uña-i.
